con:request.name: Request 1
con:request.con:request: <account> <activeTimeZone>est</activeTimeZone> <address> <zipcode>11201</zipcode> <state>NY</state> <emailAddress>bjorn@harvold.com</emailAddress> <addressType enumType="com.dialmercury.blabr.domain.DestinationType">HOME</addressType> <address_2 /> <city>Brooklyn</city> <country>USA</country> <address>154 Atlantic ave, 3R</address> <telephoneNumber>2037449235</telephoneNumber> </address> <name>bjornharvold</name> <active>true</active> <accountUsers> <accountUser> <enabled>true</enabled> <lastName>Harvold</lastName> <password>bjorn</password> <username>bjornharvold</username> <emailShow>true</emailShow> <email>bjorn@harvold.com</email> <description>This is Bjorn. He rocks.</description> <firstName>Bjorn</firstName> </accountUser> </accountUsers> </account>
